content: turn row 1 rs sl1 k across to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn r ow 2 ws sl1 p across to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 1 & 2 until 1 unworked stitch remains on each side of the worked heel turn row ending on a rs row turn s l1 k across heel to last two sts ssk closing the short row gap proceed to gusset gusset pick up and knit the 18 slipped sts along the edge of the heel flap work across the instep in main pattern pick up and k nit the 18 slipped sts on the other side of the heel flap k2tog the first 2 sts on the heel closing the last heel turn gap k across remaining heel sts to the gusset kbl 14 sts to l ast 4 sts k2tog kbl2 work across the instep in main pattern kbl2 ssk kbl the 14 remaining gusset sts n ow the heel sts become sole sts k to instep sts t he start of the instep is the new beginning of round proceed to gusset decreases © willrun4yarn 2013 | 2� gusset decreases round 1 work instep in pattern k to 4 sts before instep k2tog k2 r ound 2 work instep in pattern k2 ssk k to instep as you work through the gusset decreases you will still have the instructions from the instep to move the last stitch to the beginning of the round and back at these times continue the flow of the decreases such that at times you will e ither work to 3 sts before end of round and k2tog k1 instead of 4 sts from end of round and similar on ssk side repeat these two rounds until sole has 36 sts then continue instep in pattern and k all sole sts until foot is 5 cm 2 in s horter than desired length proceed to toe decreases toe decreases round 1 k all sts r ound 2 k2tog k to 2 sts before end of instep ssk k2tog k to 2 sts before end of sole ssk r epeat these two rounds until 36 sts remain or until correct length is reached k itchener remaining sts together weave in ends block and enjoy main pattern - chart v 22 *before working round 13 move last st to beg of round you will v * 2 * 1 have just worked this st at the end of round 12 but work it again as t he 1st slip_stitch of round 13 v 20 v 19 **after working the round 22 slip 1st st to end of round this st will v 18 r emain unworked this round v 17 v 16 v 15 v 14 v *1 v 3 12 u 11 u 10 u 9 u 8 u 7 u 6 u 5 u 4 u 3 u 2 u 1 12 11 10 9 8 7 6 5
